metaData.descriptionCS: The child looks at an incomplete matrix or series and selects the missing portion from five response options.

questions.title: Sample Item A (Matrix)
questions.correctInstructionsHTML:
Correct response [3]:

Say, That’s right. The red circle (point to response option 3) is the only answer that works going across (point across row with question mark) and down (point down column with question mark).
questions.incorrectInstructionsHTML:
Incorrect response:

Say, That’s not quite right. The red circle (point to response option 3) is the only answer that works going across (point across row with question mark) and down (point down column with question mark).
questions.topInstructionsHTML: Say, Look at these pictures. Which one here (point across response options) goes here (point to box with question mark)?

questions.title: Sample Item B (Serial Order)
questions.correctInstructionsHTML:
Correct response [1]:

Say, That’s right. The big square (point to response option 1) should come next in order (point across boxes, from child’s left to right).
questions.incorrectInstructionsHTML:
Incorrect response:

Say, That’s not quite right. The big square (point to response option 1) should come next in order (point across boxes, from child’s left to right).
questions.topInstructionsHTML: Say, Which one here (point across response options) goes here (point to box with question mark)?

questions.title: Item 1
questions.topInstructionsHTML: Say, Which one here (point across response options) goes here (point to box with question mark)?

questions.topInstructionsHTML:

The instructions may be shortened or eliminated when the child understands the task.
